rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective.
statement_text: Symptoms of the virus include a sudden increase in the mortality of a flock, a drop in egg production and diminished consumption of feed and water.

rationale: Neutral description of symptoms. No high-potency verbs or metaphors are used.
